select ord.id as id, ord.consignor_id as consignorId, cargo.id as cargoId, ord.order_date as orderDate, ord.driver_cost as driverCost, ord.china_cost as chinaCost, ord.korea_cost as koreaCost, ord.freight, ord.order_car_id as orderCarId, ord.profit, ord.quarantine_cost as quarantineCost, con.consignor_name as consignorName, cargo.cargo_name as cargoName, car.vehicle_number as orderCarNumber, ord.order_type as orderType from order_list ord left join car_list car on ord.order_car_id=car.id left join consignor_list con on ord.consignor_id=con.id left join cargo_list cargo on ord.cargo_id=cargo.id
1=1
and order_date like concat('%', #{orderDate}, '%')
and order_car_number like concat('%', #{orderCarNumber}, '%')
order by ord.order_date asc
